name: Shadow of Ether
description:
Shadows of the Ether is a first-person horror game with spiritual touches, where you'll have to banish an archon from the lower astral, survive, solve puzzles, explore the place, get out of there alive.

Play as Alex who is a person with spiritual power who is dedicated to banishing archons from haunted places, and travels to a secluded place in the forest to face a level 6 archon, who will plunge him through the lower planes of the astral world, Alex with his power and connection with mystical beings, he will have to learn to overcome this evil because it is not what he expected.

• With story and plot
• Light vs. Dark
• A game of fear and terror but also with spiritual overtones
• It is a fictional game but also based on the author's own experiences
